answers.answer: Go in for sure, sooner rather than later. Swelling in only one leg isn't a sign of preeclampsia, it's a sign of dvt, which is very dangerous, but treatable.
Did you elevate your leg? That's the only way to get the swelling to go down. If you did, get checked out.

question: So my feet have been getting swollen and yesterday my right one got really bad and my leg and it's still swollen bad right now. ....and I've been laying down all night idk if it's preeclampsia. ...I'm nervous only have 5 days left now and I guess I'm going to go in tomorrow....just to check. ..I'm so scared there going to say induce me...I'm not ready at all I've been stressing I guess mainly about my daughter she's  21 months now and I don't want to leave her
title: help!! need advice
